content.description: Of the following, which are solutions to the differential equation <math alttext="y double prime, minus 10 times y prime, plus 9 y, equals 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>″</mo></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>10</mn><msup><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>′</mo></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>9</mn><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> ?
content.question: <math alttext="y equals, 2 times the sine of, open parenthesis, 3 x, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>sin</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math><math alttext="y equals, 5 times e raised to the x power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math><math alttext="y equals, C times e raised to the 9 x power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>C</mi><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>9</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>, where <math alttext="C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>C</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> is a constant.

skill.text: Skill 3.G: Confirm that solutions are accurate and appropriate.
